Shorthand for full width fluidRow

easy_row.Rd

Shorthand for full width fluidRow

easy_row(
  ...,
  easy_col = FALSE,
  width = 12,
  align = c("left", "right", "center", "justify"),
  style = NULL,
  class = NULL,
  color = NULL,
  bg_color = NULL
)

Arguments

...

HTML tags

easy_col

Logical (TRUE/FALSE). If TRUE, add a single column.

width

width of the column() if easy_col = TRUE.

align

alignment of column() if easy_col = TRUE.

style

html formatted string to append to the style argument of a fluidRow.

class

element class to pass to fluidRow.

color

font color of the fluidRow.

bg_color

background color of the fluidRow.

Contents
